name: Black Rose Bearer
languages: understands the languages it knew in life but can't speak

trait.name: Berserk
entries: Whenever the bearer takes damage or makes a Strength or Dexterity saving throw, roll a {@dice d6}. On a 5 or 6, the bearer goes berserk. On each of its turns while berserk, the bearer has advantage on melee attack rolls, it can {@action Dash} as a bonus action, and it must attack the nearest creature it can see. If no creature is near enough to move to and attack, the bearer attacks an object, with preference for an object smaller than itself. Once the bearer goes berserk, it remains berserk until it is destroyed or its creator gives it a pristine black rose.

trait.name: Undead Fortitude
entries: If damage reduces the bearer to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5 plus the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a successful save, the bearer drops to 1 hit point instead.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The bearer makes two Slam attacks.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d8 + 3}) bludgeoning damage plus 11 ({@damage 2d10}) necrotic damage.
